Name: Illusory Leafcoil
Desc: A core formed from tightly coiled leaves, the remnant of the vanquished monster known as the Tenebrous Mimiflora.\nIt may appear lifeless and dull on the surface, yet a faint, ominous power can still be sensed pulsing within.\nPeople often wonder where the memories that such creatures drew from the earth go when they are slain. Perhaps the answer lies within this core...
